artifact_name: papyrus(under study by Gert Baetens, Leuven; Marie-Pierre Chaufray, Pessac.)
Object Type: papyrus (under study by Gert Baetens, Leuven; Marie-Pierre Chaufray, Pessac.)
Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic epistolary text on recto (7 ll.) and verso (1 ll.). Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Letter from ... son of Spotous to Petearoeris the 4th prophet of Amon. Dated year 10 Mesore 30 of unnamed King (Ptolemaic)".
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. 10555/3-6 all framed together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (625) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/625)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, fractured, loss Black ink None Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
